text: Ani mi taurataci satyata sabita karanara ahe, jo majhyasamora ahe ani mi asasathi alo ahe ki tumacyasathi tya kahi vastunna halala (vaidha) karave, jya tumacyasathi harama (avaidha) kelya gelya aheta.1 Ani mi tumacyajavala tumacya palanakartyaci nisani ghe'una alo ahe yastava tumhi allahace bhaya rakha ani majhya margace anusarana kara
